title: Внимание, говорит Москва!
overview: The main character of the film is a nineteen-year-old girl who, despite her young age, has already become a famous sniper. They write about her in newspapers, trumpet on the radio, her courage inspires the soldiers and becomes an example to follow. For everyone, she is a hero, a legend. And who is she in reality - for herself? What is she really experiencing? What secrets does her soul hide?
